hero.name: Diego Pardo
hero.title: Fullstack Developer | Founder at Quick Stack
hero.description: I help non-technical founders transform their ideas into production-ready products. I specialize in building MVPs that validate business concepts quickly—typically within 4 weeks.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: My journey into software development started at Ricaldone Technical Institute, where I graduated as a Software Development Technician. Now, while pursuing my Computer Science Engineering degree at Don Bosco University, I'm actively working as a Software Engineer at Illuminodes and running my own development agency, QuickStack.
about.paragraph2: What drives me is the intersection of code and entrepreneurship. I don't just build features—I help validate business ideas. Whether you're a startup founder needing your first MVP or an established business looking to modernize your tech stack, I bring both technical expertise and a founder's mindset to every project.
about.paragraph3: My technical foundation spans the modern JavaScript ecosystem (React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js) with expertise in both relational and non-relational databases. I'm also expanding into Rust and WebAssembly for performance-critical applications.
about.paragraph4: When I'm not coding, I'm either learning new technologies through hands-on projects, validating startup ideas in the Salvadoran market, or helping other developers level up their skills.

jobs.description: Delivered full-stack solutions for various clients, specializing in modern JavaScript frameworks and database optimization using ORMs like Sequelize and Mongoose.
Developing interactive and scalable applications using technologies like TypeScript, ReactJS, and Next.js. Building dynamic user interfaces and optimizing backend performance.
Leading an MVP development agency focused on helping early-stage founders validate business concepts. Built multiple production-ready products within 4-week cycles.

list.title: Mossbros
list.description: Full-stack motorcycle repair shop management system. Built with React 19 + TypeScript frontend and Node.js/Express + PostgreSQL backend. Features customer management, motorcycle inventory, service catalog, 6-state repair workflow with automatic cost calculation, and analytics dashboard. Modern architecture with TanStack Query, TypeORM, Redis, and JWT authentication.

list.title: AuthentiDoc
list.description: Decentralized document signing and management platform built on the Nostr protocol. PWA application with Rust/WebAssembly offering end-to-end encryption (NIP-44), multi-party signing, self-sovereign identity, and offline support via IndexedDB. Integrates Bitcoin Lightning Network and fiat payment gateways. No central servers - users maintain complete control over their data and cryptographic keys.

list.title: Raising Together Project
list.description: Raising Together Project (RTP) is a professional support platform founded by Becky Pineda, a certified Postpartum Doula. The project is dedicated to supporting families and new parents as they navigate the early stages of parenthood.
